text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: With expectations in my heart, passing through the school gate for the first time- That was my start.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: With the Debut completed, I took one step forward…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Finally, for the sake of grasping my dream, my race had begun.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …[Middle Distance Basics 1]… [Victory Percentage and Pace Management]

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Hm? Suzuka-san in the library, studying? How rare.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Fukukitaru… Yeah, I was told to study about grasping the situation during a race.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Makes sense. Choosing your tactics based on distance and track conditions was something mentioned in class.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ah! If that's the case, shall I try divining it?! The perfect strategy for Suzuka-san!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: N-no thanks! That's something for my trainer and I to decide.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I see you're frantically trying to gather information, has your next race been decided?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Air Groove… yeah, next up is [Yayoi Sho]. It's only a month away.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: It's probably because your debut was somewhat late. If you're aiming for Classic Races, your schedule is going to be packed.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: But, your victory was overwhelming wasn't it? Leading from beginning to end. At the end, extending your lead to 7 lengths.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I didn't expect you'd come and watch. Thanks for cheering for me.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ueee?! You went to cheer Suzuka-san on?! I wish you would have invited me too!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I-I didn't go to cheer, I went to observe!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: That aside, Suzuka, from now on things will be serious. Continuing to win won't be that simple.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I know. That's why I find myself here in the library.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: There's "scenery" that I wish to see…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huu… huuu…

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: 1000m in 58.5 seconds… your pace is still a little fast.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Understood.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: [Yayoi Sho] is 2000m, you need to save your stamina for the last straight. Let's run it again, this time be more mindful of your pace.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Your strength is undoubtedly top class. With flawless preparation, victory will definitely follow.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Understood. I'll do my best…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Standard practice in a race is to read the situation, find the best timing to take position, and minimize losses.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Running with that in mind increases the probability of finishing first. The most important thing is finishing first.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: The "scenery" that I want to see is definitely there-

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: With a 3 length lead, Goal! A magnificent finish to the [Yayoi Sho]!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Feeling the effects of her late start, the super popular Silence Suzuka comes in 8th. Is it because this is only her second race?!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (How the race develops, positioning, pace management, turf and weather conditions…)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (So races need to be run while keeping all these things in mind, huh?)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Last one…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (The sound of my horseshoes. Nobody in front of me, just a nice breeze.)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (Just like this, emptying my mind. I want to keep running like this.)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Haa… haaa…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (But, like that, the "scenery" I want to see-)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: It's an Uma Musume!!!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hyaa?! W-… what…?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaaaaah! It's a real live Uma Musume…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: U-um, aren't you also… an Uma Musume?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That's true, but this is the first time I've ever seen another Uma Musume!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: And! And! That running from before, it was reeeeaaally pretty!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …Ah?! I-I'm so sorry!! For staring at you like that!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I just transferred to Tracen Academy today. I'm called Special Week!!
